Hiya, my name is Anayah! I have been in bloxco for a while now since around last year July. I am a kind, respectful, responsible, reliable, loyal person and I try make everybody have a good time, where ever they are. I will do whatever it takes to make the Bloxco community a better place. My hobbies are kickboxing, netball and basketball. I am a black belt in kickboxing and I play GK in netball. I have done kickboxing for over 9 years.
